item.title: Zelensky ready to work under Trump's 'strong leadership'
item.description: The Ukrainian leader says his team is ready to negotiate after a diplomatic breakdown last week.

item.title: US stock markets fall after tariffs spark trade war fears
item.description: Canada's Prime Minister Justin said Donald Trump's decision to impose import taxes was "very dumb".

item.title: Father tries to block daughter's euthanasia in landmark Spanish case
item.description: It's the first time that a case has gone to court since a euthanasia law was introduced in Spain in 2021.

item.title: Fears Ukraine defences will last only months without US
item.description: One Ukrainian soldier said the impact of the US aid pause would be "measured in lives"

item.title: Watch: What did we learn from Meghan's new Netflix show?
item.description: The BBC's Daniela Relph takes a look at the Duchess of Sussex's new lifestyle series, 'With love, Meghan'.
